moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. Nf3 e6 3. a3 d5 4. c4 dxc4: so far I have played this game at blitz tempo not thinking at all. I now begin to struggle a bit....
moves.13... Nxc3 14. Bxc3 Qb6 15. Qc2 c5 16. d: my opponent is in too much of a hurry and loses the exchange
moves.19... Nxe5 20. Bxa8 Qxa8 21. Bxe5 Bxe5 2: this works out ok in the end but may be wrong, the queen is trapped.
moves.31. e5 Rd8 32. Qf2: Eyeing up a7 and my weak pawns around my king
moves.32... Rxd1 33. Rxd1 Be7: an interesting position, I now expected Rd7- Qxb4 so if Qa7 then Qe1 is good.
moves.34. Qb6 Bd5+: the game is now over but this bishop really has to be taken immediately.
moves.36. Rxd5 Qf1+: not often you get to checkmate with a pawn
